description: Hit polynomials; convolution of natural numbers with Fibonacci numbers F(2), F(3), F(4),....
comments: a(n) = sum of the n-th row of the triangle in A119457 for n>0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 20 2006Convolution of odds (A005408) with Fibonacci numbers (A000045) - _Graeme McRae_, Jun 06 2006Equals row sums of triangle A152203. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 29 2008Define a triangle by T(n,0) = n*(n+1)+1, T(n,n) = 1, and T(r,c) = T(r-1,c) + T(r-2,c-1). This triangle starts: 1; 3,1; 7,2,1; 13,5,2,1; 21,12,4,2,1;  The sum of terms in row n is a(n+1). - _J. M. Bergot_, Apr 23 2013
